App Name: Paramount Network App Package Name: com.vmn.android.spike

Brief:

Embrace the pinnacle of entertainment with the Paramount Network app, your dedicated spot for unrivaled TV series, movies, and comedy content. Recently making waves with the extraordinary success of 'Yellowstone Season 5', this app continues to set the bar high in the streaming universe. Dive into a library boasting over 30,000 episodes from celebrated shows and a movie collection catering to every preference. Whether you're lining up for a dose of drama or laughter for the family, Paramount Network has the versatility to deliver.

Price: üíµ

The Paramount Network app offers a free trial period for new users. Post-trial, subscribers will incur a monthly charge. The price details are provided within the app, and users have the liberty to cancel the subscription at any time, ideally 24 hours before the next billing cycle to avoid automatic charges.
